column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place is a must-go
column2: even if you are just in Chicago for a day! The pizza is delicious and true to the classic Chicago style. Not only that
column3: but all of the food is delicious here. We ordered the signature salad
column4: and we absolutely loved it. Everyone at our table agreed it was one of the best salads they had eaten in a long time. Overall
column5: an excellent restaurant and well worth the (relatively short) wait.
